lines.text: Aunt Cora, were you ever anxious to dance with a man you dreamed you danced with?

[smiling]
Don't be silly, I never dream about dancing.
Hattie, have you ever been married?
No Ma'am, but I been engaged.
No Ma'am... it's a lot better.

[under hypnosis]
Dr. Flagg is a horrible monster! Men like him should be shot down like dogs! Shot down like dogs! Shot down like dogs!
